plugins module¶

The rkplugins.

class plugins.CommandPlugin(metadata: plugins.PluginMetadata)[source]¶

Defines the command plugins.

class plugins.Plugin(metadata: plugins.PluginMetadata, ptype: plugins.PluginType)[source]¶

Defines Plugin objects.

class plugins.PluginMetadata(name: str, author: str, version: str, short_desc: str, long_desc: str)[source]¶

Defines the metadata information for a plugin. These include: name (str), author (str), version (str), short_desc (str), and long_desc (str)

class plugins.PluginType(value)[source]¶

Defines the pluging type creating an ennumeration.

class plugins.WindowedPlugin(metadata: plugins.PluginMetadata)[source]¶
